others.name: Kodi On iMon
description: The display of my media center stopped working when I updated Kodi to version 17. There was no solution available online so I built my own with scrollable text and adjustable speed, as well as a connection to the Kodi API to read the media information.

others.name: My Portfolio
description: I wanted to create a portfolio website using Vue.js that is suited for single-page applications and have a clear separation between content and functionality.
My Portfolio is created using Vue.js 2.0 and the Bootstrap framework, with all content stored in json files.

others.name: GoPro Remote
description: While traveling, I often get frustrated with the GoPro app (formerly called Capture)'s remote control functionalities so I decided to start creating my own that better suit my needs. These include being able to access the remote control faster, as well as having an option for a countdown timer.
